text.autoconfig.fleeinganimals.title: Fleeing Animals
text.autoconfig.fleeinganimals.option.ra: The detection radius multiplier (for x and z axes).
It will be multiplied by the entity's detection range. Default: 1.0
text.autoconfig.fleeinganimals.option.al: Whether all the animals shall flee regardless of their type.
If set to false, only the same animals will flee. Default: true
